description: Grants the user the ability to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. The user can become completely undetectable to the naked eye and can make other objects and people invisible as well.

users.circumstances: Absalom ate the fruit at some point before the Thriller Bark arc

abilityReveals.description: The user can make objects and other people invisible by touching them, not just themselves.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Sanji explains how Absalom's power works during their battle.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Invisibility doesn't prevent the user from making sounds or leaving footprints/traces

strengths.strength: Complete invisibility for stealth and surprise attacks
strengths.description: User can become completely invisible to the naked eye.

description: Grants the user the ability to create and control ghosts. The user can produce negative ghosts that drain opponents' will to fight, and can also project their own consciousness as an astral form.

users.circumstances: Perona ate the fruit at some point before the Thriller Bark arc

abilityReveals.description: The user can leave their physical body and project their consciousness as an intangible ghost form that can float and move freely.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Perona exits her body to confront Usopp in her astral form, introducing herself as the Ghost Princess.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Astral form cannot physically harm opponents

strengths.strength: Negative ghosts can completely demoralize opponents
strengths.description: The ghosts pass through opponents and drain their will to fight.

strengths.strength: Astral projection allows for intangibility and reconnaissance
strengths.description: The user can scout areas and avoid physical attacks while in astral form.

description: Grants the user the ability to manifest and control shadows. The user can steal shadows from others and implant them into corpses to create zombies, manipulate their own shadow as a weapon, and transform shadows into various forms.

users.circumstances: Gecko Moria ate the fruit at some point before becoming a Warlord

abilityReveals.description: Moria can manifest his own shadow as an independent entity called Doppelman that can fight on his behalf and transform into various shapes.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Doppelman fights Luffy, transforming into Brick Bats to swarm him.

abilityReveals.description: Doppelman can transform into multiple bat-shaped shadow creatures that can swarm and attack opponents.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Doppelman transforms into Brick Bats to peck at Luffy during their battle.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
The user's real body is vulnerable even when Doppelman is fighting

strengths.strength: Can create an army of zombies by implanting stolen shadows
strengths.description: The user can steal shadows and create powerful zombie servants.
Doppelman can engage opponents while the user remains relatively safe.

description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy uses his rubber body to swing from a ledge like a pendulum and delivers a powerful kick. This technique was specifically used to bypass Doppelman and hit Gecko Moria directly.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy jumps off a ledge, grabs it with his stretched arm, and swings back to kick Moria through the floor.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: Rubber body bounces back blunt force trauma.
Luffy demonstrates creative use of his rubber body to create unconventional attack angles.
